name: Rayc Ryjerd
Lore: 'An ''honest'' smuggler. Working for Jabba to pay off debts for his ship. Rycar''s son. Even more of an idiot.',
Text: 'Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots (or 4 if trained by Rycar Ryjerd). Any starfighter Rayc pilots is immune to Tallon Roll and is not lost if an asteroid sector is drawn for asteroid destiny.',
